title: "Efficiently fine-tune the ESM-2 protein language model with Amazon SageMaker"
excerpt: "In this post, we demonstrate how to efficiently fine-tune a state-of-the-art protein language model (pLM) to predict protein subcellular localization using Amazon SageMaker. Proteins are the molecular machines of the body, responsible for everything from moving your muscles to responding to infections."
